contents:
The WestHouse Hotel New York Concierge is another defining component of the WestHouse experience; a world-class team of in-house specialists tasked with creating distinctive itineraries for each guest. This heightened level of service takes advantage of unique partnerships with other premier lifestyle enhancement brands to provide Residents with experiences not found in any other luxury hotel in NYC. WestHouse Hotel New York Concierge services include:

 
  • Dining recommendations and reservations
  • Access to exclusive lounges and nightlife venues
  • Guided tours and itineraries to art galleries and museums
  • VIP access to events such as film festivals, Fashion Week, movie premieres and parades
  • Luxury ground transportation (car service / SUV) and car rentals
  • Private yacht, helicopter and jet charters
  • City tours and sightseeing with expert multilingual guides
  • Personalized shopping and consultation
  • Fresh flowers and luxury gifts
  • Spa, hair and beauty appointments
  • Experienced and certified childcare
  • Pet care and boarding
